captions.text: YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, breathe
Pick out a long saggy shirt
Shout out loud enough to shake the Earth
There's no rule in this jungle
My twisted smile is infected
Be a villain without a reason
Someone will ask why we do this
Every action needs a cause
Don't squeeze us in, that's too boring
Messy hair, crossed legs
I ain't sorry baby
Just what is the problem
This is us, yeah
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
It's really simple actually
Put your senses in your back pocket
And see what it is that you really want
Boy where's your color at
What's the deal, there's no set answer
We're too young to be sitting around, what
You know, I know, Who knows
Like the river mixing, just stir it up
When everyone's in a rush, I take it easy
I dust off my shoulders
No one chooses my life, toss that answer sheet away
I'll show you right now
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Let me breathe out
The way we live, there's no faking
Those who know will know
The way we live, there's no being tied down
We just enjoy, ya feel me
The way we live, there's no faking
Those who know will know
The way we live, there's no need to hide
We'll show it all to you
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Breathe, Ooh - La - La - La ? La
Make the crowd move
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Dangerous We are Dangerous
Breathe, You Only Live Once
YOLO here there, this way that way
Breathe, Dangerous We are Dangerous
Breathe, You Only Live Once

comments.text:
0:49 is Moos (Kim Sangbae) 91' liner, leader and main rapper.
0.51 is Buffy (Kim Juhyeon) 95' liner, (older than the maknae by three days 
lol) lead rapper.
1:07 is Lee Geon (Lee Kyungtak) 92' liner and main vocalist.
1:37 is Jota (Lee Jonghwa) 94' liner, rapper and sub vocalist (and in 
charge of acrobatics). if you're interested he appears on Dream Team's 
vault high jump if you want to watch. ^.^
1:56 is H.O (Song Jaeho) 95' liner, the maknae and vocalist.
2:01 is Heojun (we don't have a last name and i have no idea why @.@) 94' 
liner and vocalist.
2:27 is Daewon (Park Daewon) 92' liner, vocalist, main dancer and 
choreographer (he choreographed this dance)
ta da! Welcome to Madtown <3

Original comment by Maddy Black x)﻿
